column4: The type of the OCPP message. Possible values are: CALL,CALLRESULT,CALLERROR or UNKNOWN.
The action of the OCPP CALL message.
The ID tag that is transmitted in the OCPP message for Authorize, RemoteStartTransaction, ReserveNow, SendLocalList, StartTransaction and StopTransaction.
The connector ID that is transmitted in the OCPP message for StartTransaction and StopTransaction.
The JSON payload of the OCPP CALL message.
